subtitles.text: The Following episode is part of a
series dedicated to exposing an
organized hateful group that has been on
a Relentless pursuit to destroy the
medical medium community and that has
been attacking bullying harassing and
preying upon the chronically ill joining
me in the series is a guest named Amber
bakaro she's an alternative medicine
practitioner who became a whistleblower
after she witnessed this hateful group
in action when they tried to recruit her
to join them last year Amber caught the
main members of this group on legally
recorded calls describing their
premeditated multi-step plan to create a
quote postm medal medium era by feeding
false stories and claims about me and
about medical medium information to
Major media outlets in hopes that it
would lead to securing themselves a deal
for an anti-ed medium documentary on
Netflix that would bring Fame and other
benefits to them now known infamously
instead for their malicious plot that
was caught on recording and exposed we
refer to this hateful group as the
plotters their entire smear campaign is
spearheaded by one woman who comes from
an extremely wealthy family didn't get
what she wanted from me years ago and is
now seeking re Revenge she's made it her
mission to gather a bunch of plotters
with ulterior motives and AES to grind
including competitors in the health
industry to try to frame medical medium
and take down the community what this
organized hateful group has done is
unprecedented it's one of the biggest
scandals that's ever happened in the
health industry as you'll see it's also
one of the biggest instances of
capturing corruption within the
mainstream media so prepare yourself for
lots of details and nuances as we are
going to be thoroughly untangling the
massive Web of Lies they have spun and
we're going to be releasing a lot of
disturbing new information new
recordings and mind-blowing evidence of
just how far they are going to lie to
try to get what they want some of the
evidence we're presenting in these
episodes in includes original written
content such as text messages social
media posts that have been produced by
the plots and will be reenacted for
greater ease in following along those
who are listening along to the podcast
can find video versions of these
episodes on the medical medium YouTube
and Rumble channels that will be
displaying screenshots photos videos and
more some of you may be unaware that
this has even been happening but many of
you have been tremendously injured and
harmed by what they have done the record
needs to be set straight and they need
to be called out for what they've done
and are still doing the medical medium
Community does not deserve to be
attacked like this and we are going to
set the record straight as many times as
we need to
[Music]
we have a guest here with us today who

straight here

supporting her when she was SI

and what were things like after
Stephanie got sick so this was really

the pressure was never ever from

horrendous and the driving around here

we ran arands on no sleep we also opened

illness as Gretchen was in and out of

one of the hardest experiences of my

the gas station was old and the pump was

I pressed it a few times before it

wanted to do everything for

that
time
